TextView.android:text: All students in Germany must have a health insurance (from a private or a public health insurance company).
Basic information about health insurance in Germany: https://www.uni-ulm.de/en/io/degree-phd/welcome/authorities-and-insurances/health-insurance/

List of Public Health Insurances: AOK: https://www.aok.de/pk/uni/ Techniker Krankenkasse (TK): https://www.tk.de/en Barmer GEK: https://www.barmer.de/en/ Deutsche Angestellten Krankenkasse (DAK): www.dak.de

List of Private Health Insurances: Continentale: https://www.continentale.de/web/info-siebel-bittner Debeka: https://www.debeka.de/produkte/versichern/krankenversicherung/kv-studenten/index.html Barmenia: https://www.barmenia.de/ HanseMerkur: https://www.hansemerkur.de/
